title: How to Start Beekeeping
itunes:title: How to Start Beekeeping- Beginners Guide to Natural Beekeeping
description: Learn how to start beekeeping with in depth guide on choosing the right place for your hives, types of hives, where to buy bees, how to choose the best bees based on your climate, what supplies you must have to get started (and some frugal options), what to look for when performing hive checks, how much  honey to expect, and how much setting up a backyard hive costs. Get the full blog post and resources for this episode at https://melissaknorris.com/179

Get the full blog post and resources for this episode at https://melissaknorris.com/179

author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
